from itertools import chain, combinations
import itertools

t=int(raw_input())
for ik in range(t):

   a=map(int,raw_input().split())
   a.sort()
   k=int(raw_input())
   b=a[len(a)-k:]
   ans=sum(b)
   e=map(list,itertools.combinations(a,k))
   counter=0
   for s in e:
      if(sum(s)==ans):
         counter+=1
   print counter
